biotools.summary:
Estimating the regulatory potential of DNA methylation in gene transcription.

Assessing the regulatory potential of DNA methylation regions or sites on gene transcription.

Epigenome-wide association studies (EWAS) detects a large number of DNA methylation differences, often hundreds of differentially methylated regions and thousands of CpGs, that are significantly associated with a disease, many are located in non-coding regions.

bioschemas.name: MethReg
